title: Introducing: Leave the Planet
body:
I’m a little late to this one, but boy am I glad I’ve found **Leave the Planet**.

 With only two tracks online, this London duo (Nathalia Bruno and Jack Milwaukee) create brooding and dark soundscapes with a hazy and washed out production that I can’t help but fall for. _Between Bodies_ is a startling good effort, the guitars perched subtly above the gritty electronic landscape below. It really is a mesmerising sound.

(Thanks to [The Undscvrd](http://www.theundscvrd.com/new-artists/leave-the-planet/) for putting me onto these guys).
